Laki ganteng bininya 3

The conclusion to this masterpiece of a series. The club president tells him that the true goal of the sex acts club was a secret ploy by the government to train Izumi('s dick) into a breeding horse to combat the decreasing birth rate problem and normalizing polygamy. Izumi was chosen because they found he had extraordinary vigor. He's told that he has to choose to either fuck everyone in the school or get expelled and have another male student take his place (NTR bait). Izumi refuses and compromises by saying he loves the three girls and says he will marry all three of them. The president accepts and it's revealed the part about him having to fuck everyone in the school was just a lie to entice him. He receives rings from the president (the girls got wedding dresses) and proposes to the girls on the spot, then they conduct club activities for the last time with the goal of impregnating the girls. Fast forward a few years and they're living their polygamous lives happily ever after.
Gentlemen it has been an honor to follow this doujin by your side, thanks to Amano Don for creating such a masterpiece and the end left me very happy and pleased 👀👌
